content.raw:
@jordanlack @hsu @scpeters @jrivero I'm fine w/ whatever version of Gazebo you guys decide on, as long as it satisfies the following:

1. I can run Atlas
2. It works with ROS Indigo since we have to target an LTS and JSC has already standardized on Indigo (If you wanna target Kame you need to talk to JSC)
3. This may end up being unsolvable if we stay with Indigo, but it would be really nice if whatever we end up deciding on gets installed via `sudo apt-get ros-<release>-desktop-full`. Given that Indigo is an LTS and currently `ros-indigo-desktop-full` pulls in GZ 2, I'm not sure how easy that is going to be.

Can we open a separate issue to discuss this?
